artist: Designer: Adrianne Morag-Ferguson; Manufacturer: Heal's Fabrics
description: Bkg. dark blue and white overlapping swirls on white; 6-1/2 repeats; three pairs circles with different design (snails, trees, hills, landscapes) with colors dark blue, red, orange, purple, white
markings: \'HEALS \'GLENTANNA\' DESIGNED BY ADRIANNE MORANG-FERGUSON TOP ->\', \'<- TOP WOVEN AND PRINTED IN ENGLAND SHRINK RESISTANT\', printed in white border to either side
title: Glentanna
